title: Patch 8.1 Bug Splats and Installation installs on loading
body:
for the second time today, whilst on the loading screen, I recieved a bug splat leading to the League Client wanting to repair the install, which takes around 15-20 minutes.

This normally would be a minor inconvenience, but it seems I am getting Leaverbuster penalties through NO FAULT OF MY OWN as it has only begun happening today, with the launch of 8.1, and the game never seems happy with itself.

Seriously if these negatively affect my honour standings and such I will be most put out. Great start to the year.
